caption.title: Municipalities that will potentially face the highest negative shift on pollinatorsâ€™ occurrence probability and that present the highest percentage of gross domestic product (GDP) associated to the analyzed crops.
caption.p: We considered 25% of the highest values of negative shift on pollinators and, from those, the 15 municipalities that present the highest percentage of GDP associated to the analyzed crop. Acerola was not included due to the lack of data.
Click here for additional data file.
